Attack from Blind Spot.effect: Inflicts damage to one enemy of any physical or magic element, whichever is more effective. Inflicts Shock

Black Courier.effect: User takes a hit for an ally if they have better resistance to that attack

Coiste-Bohhar.effect: Greatly increases speed during a skirmish

Demon Dance.effect: Inflicts Curse damage to random targets equal to about 25% of the target's current HP. Hits 2-5 times, max 3 times on one enemy

Do you wanna be crushed?.effect: Increases the damage done by the user's next attack. Wears off once skirmish ends

Dream Eater.effect: Steals a large amount of MP from one enemy

Excharge.effect: Offense +50% during Extra Turn or Double Extra

Extra Zero.effect: All skills are free during Extra Turn or Double Extra

Final Hit.effect: Reduces user's HP to 1, then inflicts that much Almighty damage on one enemy

Hidden Strength.effect: When user is low on HP, physical offense +50%

Holy Blessing.effect: Restores HP upon landing a critical hit

I hate violence!.effect: Guaranteed critical hit on one enemy

Ignore Defense.effect: Physical attacks cannot be resisted, nullified, or absorbed

Informant.effect: Reduces chance of character's Extra Turns being removed

Invincible Bartender.effect: Withstand one mortal blow once per skirmish with 1 HP remaining

Kinetic Vision.effect: When a team member dodges an attack, all team members have a 50% bonus to all stats for the rest of the skirmish

Shadow Scythe.effect: Inflicts damage to all enemies, ignoring all resistances except for Repel

Shadow Shield.effect: Blocks non-Almighty attacks for all allies, including Pierce-enhanced attacks

Shield All EX.effect: Casts Shield All at the start of the skirmish

Sweet Talk.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Charm ailment to all enemies

That Substantial Shadow.effect: Reduces chances of suffering from any ailment

Then just die.effect: Inflicts damage of a random element

This is not murder.effect: Inflicts heavy unavoidable Physical damage on one enemy, but cannot kill it unless it has 1 HP
